amendment.description: Amendment allocates an addtional $5 million for Nuclear Nonproliferation in order to allow R&D to take place using low-enriched uranium for naval reactor fuel.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation account by $5,000,000 and reduce funds for National Nuclear Security Administration salaries and expenses by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Langevin.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
